author: Wiktor Szary
title: Former Russian Spy Poisoned by Nerve Agent, U.K. Police Say
text:
LONDONâ€”A former Russian intelligence officer and his daughter are believed to have been poisoned by a nerve agent, British police said Wednesday, adding they now considered the case attempted murder.
Sergei Skripal, a 66-year-old former colonel in Russian military intelligence, and his 33-year-old daughter, Yulia, remained in critical condition in a hospital after being found unconscious on a bench outside a shopping mall in Salisbury, in southwestern England, on Sunday afternoon.
